price: Ẹni tí Ó ń sọ omi kalẹ̀ láti sánmọ̀ níwọ̀n-níwọ̀n. Ó sì ń fi sọ òkú ilẹ̀ di àyè ilẹ̀. Báyẹn náà ni wọn yóò ṣe mu yín jáde.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
